newsitem.title: USA: Wiser Oil Co Q3 net rises. [CORRECTED]
newsitem.headline: Wiser Oil Co Q3 net rises. [CORRECTED]

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)

NOTES: 1996 Q3 net income, before gains from securities sales, property sales and non-cash impairment charges was $1.9 million (corrects from $2.8 million) or $0.21 (corrects from $0.31) per share versus a loss of $1.0 million or $0.11 per share for 1995 same period.
Third quarter cash flow from operations before working capital changes and income taxes associated with securities sales was $8.2 million versus $4.8 million in 1995.

Nine-month 1995 net income, before gains on security, property sales, and non-cash impairment charges was $2.6 million (corrects from $4.0 million) or $0.29 (corrects from $0.45) per share, compared with a net loss of $2.4 million, or $0.27 per share.

Nine-month cash flow from operations, before changes in working capital and income taxes associated with security sales, increased 40 percent to $20.9 million compared with $14.9 million for the same period 1995.
